website_summaries.verdict: We haven't seen a flawless smart lock yet, but the August Smart Lock comes closer than any of its competitors thanks to its ease of use and overall polish.
pros: Good looks, strong user management, and convenient automated features make the August Smart Lock a leader in its niche
cons: Android users don't get auto-unlock at launch, Bluetooth can cause irritating connection lag, you can't control the August Smart Lock over Wi-Fi without a separate hub and at $250 it's one of the most expensive smart locks available

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great if it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 months! then became unusable, i became locked out of house 2 twice when decided to stop working and unlock the lock halfway. Really wanted to love this product but was unreliable. Also the customer service with august was no help after 3 attempts to work with them, i was meet with horrible condescension and not actual help. I am a technical guy, it was very upsetting. The final straw was then they said they need to set up a Skype session with me, then couldn't get them to confirm a time or date.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Swanson

customer_reviews.title: This is the second smart lock I've owned and I have to say that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second smart lock I've owned and I have to say that I'm quite disappointed in my purchase. I find the auto unlock feature to rarely work. This was the room set reason I bought this lock, so that when my hands were full or my bike was in my hands the door would unlock for me. The auto lock feature takes too long to trigger so I have to lock the door with my phone each time. I as also under the impression this lock could be unlocked over the Internet/wifi but that's not the case. After spending $250 on this lock I also have to ourchase and $80 add on product to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W

customer_reviews.title: I would pay twice as much for the same product.  That's how great it is.
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine life without it now. This is a game changer. It was easy and straightforward to install and 15 minutes later I had a smart door. I feel like a baller coming home and the door automatically unlocking. I also have it configured to re-lock 30 seconds later. I feel safer and the convenience is second to none. If you're considering this - don't think anymore, add to cart, and buy. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke! Do not buy, unless you want to wait for 10sec on your front door looking like an idiot. Way to expensive then they make you buy a $50 extra part to talk to it remotely so basically the unit is $250. Stupid... Use a key, it's faster and more reliable
customer_reviews.author: deli

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first six months, then the app updates made the usage impossible. The app discharge the phone battery in half day. Most of the time the door never opens when geting close to home; more than half of the time it "can't connect", but it connects fine if I manually retry. I should have bought the Kiwikset instead. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sorin Toma

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I am ecstatic with this purchase. It was so easy to set up, and has worked like a charm. People enjoy the ease of use if they need to get in my place, and I love that everything is normal outside so no one would ever know I have it. Being able to unlock the door before I approach is huge because I always have my hands full. Definitely a fan.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cole

customer_reviews.title: August BRILLIANT lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use, very well packaged, they work brilliantly, and they look great...and the new "August Works With" partnerships are a game changer – you can have packages and other deliveries dropped off inside your house, have dog groomers pick up/drop off your pooches, and tons of other great services as well as integrations with Nest, Harmony, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Poillon

customer_reviews.title: It's been working great 😊
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the August lock for 4 years and have been very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin-007

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this smart lock. It works just as advertised so far. I was skeptical because of the price. I have to say that it is worth every penny. I really like the fact that it opens up when i come up to the door and locks automatically when I leave. Sendinf other people keys and setting up access is really easy. Overall, this is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn_cooks_sugar

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The feature where it auto unlocks as you approach does not always work for me but it is not a huge problem. The manual lock/unlock works well. I love the fact that it works with my Nest thermostat to set the Away mode. Be aware that your current lock must align well for this to work. If you have to push/pull the door to lock it then this may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: David Ricciardelli

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying specially when guests call you about it
customer_reviews.text: The main problem I have is the battery door keeps falling off when you turn the knob. It is very difficult to (slippery) to close it. Very annoying specially when guests call you about it. Also it should keep track of every time lock and unlock is activated even manually and it doesn't Other that those two items it does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lock worked for one year, as soon as warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: Lock worked for one year, as soon as warranty expired, so did the lock. August customer service refused to replace or fix the lock, all that was offered was a small discount for me to purchase another lock. What a SCAM @AugustHomeInc
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Read the compatibility list.
customer_reviews.text: 4 Star's because it doesn't fit my Medeco deadbolt. Advice... read the detailed compatibility list first. Kinda of miss leading with the standard "If your lock looks like this" images. Other than that it's a great product. Good construction, easy setup. Will update in a few months after I've got some use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: I like the actual product I just wish that its more ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the actual product I just wish that its more consistent with its functionality. Sometimes it provides information when it unlocks and locks and sometimes it doesnt. Its also hard to lock the door remotely because I have to push the door so that it can lock. I have to fix my door so that there isnt any interference.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmil

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never know how much you hate looking for your keys to get in, until you do not have to any more. Takes some time to get used to it, but the auto lock makes me feel secure( never worry if you locked or not it will do it after 1-5 minutes for you)!
customer_reviews.author: chad libutti

customer_reviews.title: My wife's phone is the primary phone for the lock and it seems to work good for her
customer_reviews.text: Not as reliable as I had hoped. My wife and I have Samsung android phones, my youngest has an iphone and another daughter has an android. My wife's phone is the primary phone for the lock and it seems to work good for her, my daughter with the iphone doesn't have a problem either but I and my other daughter often cannot connect to the lock. It says, "out of range" or just says "connecting" and never does connect. The auto lock was something I liked until it stopped working. Then, out of the blue, it started working again. Just not as reliable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jennen

customer_reviews.title: I seriously hate this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but boy oh boy. This is so not ready for prime time. Between this and the stupid connect product I feel so cheated. This is suppose to make your life easier not more frustrating. The damn app,works like half the time. I literally will be right in front of the lock and the app reports out range or disconnect. The connect when it works is great. That's like 2 out of 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: ciscocapital

customer_reviews.title: Mine's working as it should and I like it. The only thing I wish it could ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the negative reviews, I recently installed one of these with the keypad and so far, no problems. Mine's working as it should and I like it. The only thing I wish it could do is not automatically relock if the door is opened but that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: joaklay

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I wrote to support and haven't made much progress with them. 1. It's slow slow slow. 2. It seemed advertised you would get notifications about who opened the door. I have never received any notifications. 3. All along the dangled a HomeKit compatible device and said its coming. Now they say you will need new devices. Sorry bad experience. Going with a different product. 4. It's a bit bulky 5. The front battery cover pops off too easy
customer_reviews.author: E. ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much pointless. The time it takes you to connect to the lock you could have had your keys out and be inside the house. Cool concept but it's slow and way too expensive
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just wish you didn't need to buy an additional product for a wifi connection
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Lock fails after a few weeks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is extraordinarily frustrating! From day 1 I had problems setting it up. Granted my first phone had Bluetooth problems, so that one was one me. We bought new phones, did factory reset, setup the lock and everything worked great for about 3 weeks. Suddenly my husband & son could no longer use the lock, the app on their their phones could not find the lock. Twice I did a factory reset and resent invitations to avail. I have now sent a support request (only option fill out a generic form online). I will update as things progress.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Dependable & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: exceptional product. Dependable & easy to use. Simple to install & it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Helder

customer_reviews.title: Wait till they iron out the bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few issues gettin gusers added. Still cannot get the August Connect to work. Support gave up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Gjekel

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money now collecting dust.
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward install but could never get it to sync with Android phone even with the phone held adjacent to lock. Only suggested fix was to start from the very beginning of install process. Tech support non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Android App Unable to callibrate lock.
customer_reviews.text: Android users beware. I'm running Android 6.0.1 on a Nexus 5. I was unable to finish the setup within the App. After a couple minutes of trying, I switched to my wife's iPhone and the physical lock was calibrated and configured in seconds. Aside from the initial calibration, the Android version of the App has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FORGET YOUR PHONE WHEN YOU TAKE OUT THE GARBAGE / GET THE MAIL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I'm not sure if all the negative reviews are pre-updates or technically challenged people (mine installed two updates as soon as I hooked it up). The only downside is I almost locked myself out taking out the garbage without my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Damn Good Lock - Even Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This a quality lock that I bought to replace another brand that was unreliable and had poor customer service. This one works, and their customer service is very rapid (!) and excellent. Features such as Everlock (automatic locking feature) and Auto-Unlock are extremely helpful to me. They have a newer model out now that is Apple Homekit compatible, but this has everything I need. I did order their new keypad, though, since that will be handier than grappling with a key, while also controlling dogs on entry when that becomes necessary.
customer_reviews.author: dogperson

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our new lock. It was easy to install and has worked perfectly 100% of the time. Take the time to make sure your dead bolt operates smoothly before installing and follow the instructions to calibrate the lock. So nice to be key free for our house and car. Just need to carry my iPhone that has a case that has space for drivers license and a couple of credit cards. I saw this on This Old House Hour and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Good but Has Some Design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as it seemed to install. Find a pro to help you install on your door. Every time you manually close the lock, the battery cover comes off witch is annoying. Otherwise, it works great and is a great solution for kids to be able to get in and out of the house without needing a key.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Younesi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work over a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and install, We thought this was a great product. But over time it jams and will not work consistently. We replaced it with a standard key lock.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Stillmank

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Batteries don't seem to last very long. Takes 4 batteries per change. Generally works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: August Smart Lock works fine
customer_reviews.text: The batteries life are shorter than expected. August Smart Lock works fine, but its connection with August Connect Wi-Fi Bridge does not work as expected
customer_reviews.author: FELIPE A

customer_reviews.title: Great home automation device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an alternative to giving a cleaning service a key. The app works great and allows me to set the time the cleaning service has access to the house and also records when they access the house. I bought it with the August Connect and I can also let people in while I'm at work (kids, friends before I get home, etc). My door did hang up a little when closing the bolt, so I elected to use the dremel to clean up the bolt prior to installing instead of buying a tapered deadbolt from them. The install was quick and easy. Everything works great and pretty quickly even over cellular.
customer_reviews.author: A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: After just three months it does not work at all. The calibration function is broken and I'm going to take it off my door and buy the same smart lock I use at my office. This could have been a great product and I even went out and bought the WiFi adapter but after three months I'm done with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wesley

customer_reviews.title: as the convenience and trouble saved so far are enough that I never want to go back to a dumb door.
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! So much depends on the app though, and through the course of changing phones or updating to the newest iOS versions, feature performance really drifts back and forth. Every manual lock/unlock I've performed has worked, though the occasional failed auto-unlock is enough to irritate. I'm sticking with it though,as the convenience and trouble saved so far are enough that I never want to go back to a dumb door.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it can't wait to see what the come up with nest . Using the August with nest really helps too . I will try the Apple Watch app later
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sullian Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... Using it in a public place, where a number of guests can open & close the front door. We really like the feature giving permission only for a few days for some of the guests..
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Vittal

customer_reviews.title: It's super convenient, but it has a really hard time ...
customer_reviews.text: It's super convenient, but it has a really hard time automatically connecting to bluetooth on my phone (if it connects at all). It's slow, doesn't detect the GPS fence, locks automatically indiscriminately (there aren't any rules about when to lock it). Great idea, needs tons of work. Also, the faceplate keeps falling off. Technical support was very willing to buy and test against a new phone model, though. It just needs some work on features, reliability and interface.
customer_reviews.author: caterpillar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time the auto unlock does not work but otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Olson

customer_reviews.title: Lock doesn't fit the door if you have Molding on ...
customer_reviews.text: Lock doesn't fit the door if you have Molding on door panels... It needs a 1-2" space around for the wing hooks to close. The size is very awkward and stands out when mounted on door.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Works nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love to hear the door unlocks as I approach my house! Set up was very easy, basically two screws and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques R.

customer_reviews.title: Android phones not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Connects fine with iPhone however Samsung galaxy S5 unable to connect with lock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a keypad type lock or just a lockbox instead
customer_reviews.text: This lock is very unreliable. It has lot of connection problems both via bluetooth and via wifi. It would also get jammed constantly, my guests were confused on how to lock the door from the inside (rotate the entire device) and the face plate of the lock would constantly fall off (and eventually broke). I gave up and uninstalled it after many guests were locked out of my house. I would recommend a keypad type lock or just a lockbox instead, which both are much more affordable and reliable options.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Now my mother doesn't have to fumble for her keys every time she gets home. Quality and build seems high end. Worked right out of the box. Installation didn't even take 10 minutes. Recent software update sped up connection time between phone and lock and is now almost instantaneous!
customer_reviews.author: Rex F. Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing product the only negative is that sometimes after we open the door from the inside, the deadbolt will slightly come out so that we can't close the door. I have to then come back inside and fully unlock it. I like that if I'm not home I can let others in and I mostly like that I can cancel any keys that I sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.

customer_reviews.title: I love the August lock
customer_reviews.text: I love the August lock. I get the occasional misfire with the BT connection, but all in all I think it is a solid product. Extremely easy to install-it took about 10-15 minutes. I will probably be adding the August Connect in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: David Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A few minor issues on installation
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A few minor issues on installation. Do not over tighten mounting plate and you should be fine. Auto lock feature is awesome but has a draw back. If you take your pets out for a walk don't forget your phone or you will get locked out. Please update the ability to set a longer window for auto lock
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Buggy software.
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough lock, however, setup took forever. No rhyme or reason as to why Bluetooth connects or doesn't on this thing. WiFi plug in module doesn't work at all for me. And if you do get it to work, it's 2.4 N only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bulky, difficult to use, unintuitive, and half the time it didn't work. We sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Back o' Beyond

customer_reviews.title: It is the coolest product ever.
customer_reviews.text: i was expecting a faster response during opening and closing. overall awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. James

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few issues with this lock.But it's pretty good.The auto lock feature is very good & I have had not had any issues with this.The auto unlock is the problem.Go out for a walk in the local area come back does not auto unlock. Get in the car and drive a few miles come back auto unlock works. When this works as it should it will be 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN BALSOM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered new smart lock and I received used and locked by original user see attached
customer_reviews.author: Adnan

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected... have been using for several months and have had no issues... The wifi capability makes it that much nicer...
customer_reviews.author: Luis Medina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This the best smart lock in the market it works great recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wason

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and good support
customer_reviews.text: Works great on a deadbolt. Allows you to give access without keys. And it keeps track of who entered house and when
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Locking is Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Installing it was a snap. It really works seamlessly and efficiently. I just took one star off because the time needed for you to take your phone, open the app, wait until it detects the lock, then open your door is ridiculous. You can definitely take your key out of your pocket and open your door faster. The fact that it locks your door automatically deserves the four stars. The built quality and style are great.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for my pourpose
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay product to me, I guess I was just imagining a different scenario with this lock and in practice it failed for me. Having to open my phone, open the app and wait for the refresh in order to unlock was just too much of a hassle especially while carrying a few things already, Sooooo poor August had to go back to Amazon. I do have to point out that I ended up buying a Yale touchscreen deadbolt that is working fabulously well, with just a small quirk with the Wink hub for remote unlock but im happy to live with that as the ease of use of the lock it is much much more satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Neyll

customer_reviews.title: Had to  change battery twice in a month. inconsistent performance. Not happy. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had to change battery twice in a month. inconsistent performance. Not happy. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Iluvtravel

customer_reviews.title: please do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It doest not meet the purpose, please do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Rayan kheder

customer_reviews.title: works great. i can open the app and have my ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. i can open the app and have my door unlocked in the time it takes to go from the car to my apartment, minimal noise, the motor is fairly quiet
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Henning

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's too wide for my door as it opens outwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend staying very far from this product
customer_reviews.text: It should work with wink but it's a closed system. Not user friendly. Would recommend staying very far from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: wait for version 3.0
customer_reviews.text: Not ready for prime-time. Totally unreliable. Spent way too much time 'manually' unlocking this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Logic Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Calibrates fine but won't work after that
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent lock. Most of the time it will not lock. Calibrates fine but won't work after that
customer_reviews.author: Eric Houser

product_meta.title: August Home 1st Generation Smart Lock - Dark Grey
product_meta.description:
The August Smart Lock is the intelligent, secure way to manage access to your home from your iOS and Android devices

Disclaimer
Warranty is only effective for US & CA customers.
feature_bullets: Secure - Safe, keyless access to your home with iOS and Android smartphones
Easy DIY Retrofit Install, - Replace the interior of your existing deadbolt; outside is unchanged
Total Control - You control who has access to your home and manage how long their access lasts
Always On - Powered by batteries means it's always on, even if your power, Wi-Fi, or cable go down
Kindly refer the installation videos, August Smart Lock works with the free August app to create keys, grant access, view the activity log, and more, available for Android(TM) and iOS.

specifications.Style: Keyless Home Entry with Your Smartphone
specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars129 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
